description:
Perhaps because of Alice`s arrival, Shinobu, Aya, and Yoko find themselves noticing foreigners frequently around town.
Yoko suddenly announces she met a blonde girl just recently, and an excited Shinobu asks Yoko for more details.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Quel genre d`amis vais-je me faire ?
What Kind of Friends Will I Make?
どんなトモダチできるかな
